reviewText: A fantastic film that TCM should show yearly -  but they won't touch it. Great story, great film and the only film in which a roller  skating bear gets an upset stomach, giving the star a chance at stardom. And the music is fantastic! Buy and elnoy!!!
No special effects, just good acting and great stars from Soviet Times.  Gives very good insight into regular peoples lives and struggles and joys.  Watch it and benefit !
